about: I am a passionate Mexican Full-Stack developer with a deep interest in technology. Over the past year, I have focused on improving my skills in web development, including using languages like JavaScript, TypeScript, and Java, as well as popular frameworks and libraries. As a self-taught learner, I find great enjoyment in exploring new technologies and reading extensively to stay up-to-date with industry trends. Now, I am seeking new opportunities that allow me to continue honing my skills and contribute to exciting projects.
